text: (gentle spirited music)
- For the first time in the entire history

of the automotive industry,
we're seeing that,

you know, companies are
scaling outside of India,
and for us as Ultraviolette,
it's a very proud moment

to be able to ship,
from India, motorcycles,
to Germany and other parts of the world.

Now is where innovation is
happening right here in India,
and we're building world-class products
for the entire world.

All of our motorcycles
connect to the AWS platform
where our data's analyzed in real time,

and even used to sort of
give customer insights

as well as, you know, connect
back with our customers.
So AWS has helped us scale in our journey,

and it's very exciting
when we continue to be,
you know, excited about working with AWS
on all of the future possibilities

and all of the next
generation technologies

that are, you know,
going to be appearing on,
not just the F77s,
but on all of our future products as well.
(upbeat music)
